1.name: 更新系统
1.cmd: if [ -x "$(command -v apt)" ]; then sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y; elif [ -x "$(command -v yum)" ]; then sudo yum update -y; elif [ -x "$(command -v dnf)" ]; then sudo dnf upgrade --refresh -y; elif [ -x "$(command -v pacman)" ]; then sudo pacman -Syu --noconfirm; else echo "Unsupported package manager"; fi

2.name: 清理系统
2.cmd: if [ -x "$(command -v apt)" ]; then sudo apt autoremove -y && sudo apt clean; elif [ -x "$(command -v yum)" ]; then sudo yum autoremove -y && sudo yum clean all; elif [ -x "$(command -v dnf)" ]; then sudo dnf autoremove -y && sudo dnf clean all; elif [ -x "$(command -v pacman)" ]; then sudo pacman -Rns $(pacman -Qdtq) --noconfirm && sudo pacman -Sc --noconfirm; else echo "Unsupported package manager"; fi

10.name: 移除常用废弃端口
10.cmd: firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-port=39000-40000/tcp --permanent && firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-port=20/tcp --permanent && firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-port=21/tcp --permanent && firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-port=22/tcp --permanent && firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-port=888/tcp --permanent && firewall-cmd --reload

10.name: 移除常用废弃端口
10.cmd: ufw delete allow 39000:40000/tcp && ufw delete allow 20/tcp && ufw delete allow 21/tcp && ufw delete allow 22/tcp && ufw delete allow 888/tcp

4.name: 允许80和443端口
4.cmd: iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT && iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --dport 443 -j ACCEPT

9.name: 移除常用废弃端口
9.cmd: iptables -D INPUT -p tcp --dport 39000:40000 -j ACCEPT && iptables -D INPUT -p tcp --dport 20 -j ACCEPT && iptables -D INPUT -p tcp --dport 21 -j ACCEPT && iptables -D INPUT -p tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT && iptables -D INPUT -p tcp --dport 888 -j ACCEPT

5.name: 放行宝塔面板端口
5.cmd: read -p "Enter IP addresses (多个ip用空格隔开，ip段格式192.168.1.0/24): " IPS && BT_PORT=$(cat /www/server/panel/data/port.pl) && for IP in $IPS; do firewall-cmd --permanent --add-rich-rule="rule family='ipv4' source address='$IP' port protocol='tcp' port='$BT_PORT' accept"; done && firewall-cmd --reload && echo "已放行宝塔面板白名单 IPs: $IPS"

1.name: 重装 CentOS 7
1.cmd: wget --no-check-certificate -qO InstallNET.sh 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/leitbogioro/Tools/master/Linux_reinstall/InstallNET.sh' && chmod a+x InstallNET.sh && bash InstallNET.sh -centos 7 -pwd 'abcd1234'

commands.fx80443: sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=public --add-port=80/tcp && sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=public --add-port=443/tcp && sudo firewall-cmd --reload
commands.yccy: sudo firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-port=39000-40000/tcp --permanent && sudo firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-port=20/tcp --permanent && sudo firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-port=21/tcp --permanent && sudo firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-port=22/tcp --permanent && sudo firewall-cmd --zone=public --remove-port=888/tcp --permanent && sudo firewall-cmd --reload
commands.fxbt: read -p "Enter IP addresses (多个ip用空格隔开，ip段格式192.168.1.0/24): " IPS && BT_PORT=$(cat /www/server/panel/data/port.pl) && for IP in $IPS; do firewall-cmd --permanent --add-rich-rule="rule family='ipv4' source address='$IP' port protocol='tcp' port='$BT_PORT' accept"; done && firewall-cmd --reload && echo "已放行宝塔面板白名单 IPs: $IPS"
